document_data.name: Branley
document_data.mainbody: '''Private Branley''' was a soldier of the [[Neverwinter Guard]] who fought for [[Neverwinter|his city]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Template:Cite game/Neverwinter}}
document_data.Activities: At his post, Branley took to welcoming new adventurers and members of the city guard, briefing them of the situation as they ventured into the beleaguered [[Blacklake District]]. He offered particular warning against the group known as the [[Nashers]] and their leader [[Karzov]].
document_data.History: Branley was stationed in the city's Blacklake District following the [[Siege of Neverwinter]], in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}.
